Title: Relates to the eligibility of occupants of public housing authorities for rental assistance
Summary: Relates to the eligibility of occupants of public housing authorities for rental assistance; authorizes occupants of public housing authorities to receive rental assistance at the same times as all other eligible populations.
LawCode: Amd Part BB subpart A ยง1, Chap 56 of 2021
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 56 of the laws of 2021, establishing the "COVID-19 Emergency Rental Assistance Program of 2021", in relation to the eligibility of occupants of public housing authorities for rental assistance
